twc_daily.narrative: Thunderstorms early. Lows overnight in the mid 70s.
Slight chance of a thunderstorm. Highs in the low 90s and lows in the low 70s.
Afternoon showers and thunderstorms. Highs in the upper 80s and lows in the low 70s.
Showers and thunderstorms late. Highs in the mid 80s and lows in the low 70s.
Afternoon thunderstorms. Highs in the upper 80s and lows in the low 70s.
A few clouds. Highs in the low 90s and lows in the low 70s.
More sun than clouds. Highs in the low 90s and lows in the low 70s.

nws_periods.name: This Afternoon
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Sunny, with a high near 94. Southwest wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nws_periods.name: Tonight
nws_periods.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Mostly Clear
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 7pm. Mostly clear, with a low around 75. West wind 0 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nws_periods.name: Thursday
nws_periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely after 10am. Mostly sunny. High near 93, with temperatures falling to around 88 in the afternoon. West wind 0 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nws_periods.name: Thursday Night
nws_periods.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms Likely then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
nws_periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely before 10pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 10pm and 1am, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly cloudy, with a low around 75. West wind 0 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%.

nws_periods.name: Friday
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 7am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 7am and 10am, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly sunny, with a high near 91. West wind 0 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%.

nws_periods.name: Friday Night

nws_periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely before 10pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 10pm and 1am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 1am and 4am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly cloudy, with a low around 74. West wind 0 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%.

nws_periods.name: Saturday Night
nws_periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely. Partly cloudy, with a low around 73. West wind 0 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%.
